summary: Summon a group of high level companies to fight by your side.
descriptionHtml:
------------Features--------------------------------------------------------------
This mod changed twin soul perk to quad soul perk so that it allows four summons at a time.
A chest and a strongbox can be found in the upper level of Hall of Countenance. The chest contains conjuration spells for vanilla game. The strongbox contains conjuration spells for dawnguard DLC.

Each added spell summons four high level companies (in the same faction) for 20min. Their duration is affected by Atromancy perk. The average level of summoned creatures is 50, so those spells are really unbalanced in early levels. 

I usually summon them, go invisible and lead this merry band of misfits through the dungeon. Without player\'s interference, their poor AI makes them quite balanced at high level.

------------Vanilla Spells-----------------------------------------------------
Conjure Arch Warlocks: Summons an Arch Pryomancer, an Arch Cryomancer, an Arch Electromancer and an Arch Conjurer.

Conjure Draugr Lords : Summons two Death Overlords and two Deathlords.

Conjure Dremora Company: Summons two Valkynaz warriors and two Valkynaz Mages.

Conjure Forsworn Company: Summons two briarheart  melee, one warlord archer and one ravager mage.

-----------Dawnguard DLC Spells-------------------------------------------------

Conjure Falmer Company: Summons two warmonger melee, one warmonger spellsword and one warmonger archer.

Conjure Vampire Company: Summon a nightmaster, a nightlord, a gargoyle sentinel and a death hound.


------------Installation-------------------------------------------------
Extract the *.esp file to data folder and load them.
SummonFaction.esp is the main file.
SummonFaction_dawnguard.esp for summon falmers and vampires.
author: ASSUMING CONTROL
